div.p: IN THE NAME OF MY PEOPLE--
LAY IN A COURSE FOR TROYIUS.
IF I WAS TO PUT THE GIFT
AM I A SOFT TROYIAN FAWN
I DO NOT FIND THEM SO.
BUT IF THAT'S THE ONLY WAY
I WISH YOU HAD TOLD ME
THAT YOU WANTED A TOUR OF
IT WAS A DEEP WOUND, JIM.
HE LOST A LOT OF BLOOD,
I WOULD NOT HAVE OUR RULER
AND I WILL NOT BE GIVEN
IF I HAVE TO STAY HERE
HE FELT HAD TO DIE FOR IT?
I WANT TO BE BY YOUR SIDE.
IS TO TAKE ME TO TROYIUS.
I WANT TO DIE WITH YOU.
A FEW TESTS TO MAKE SURE.
THERE IS NO WAY TO JUDGE
YOU AND SPOCK GET UP HERE.
I WANT TO CUT IN WARP DRIVE.
AND BRING ALL TUBES TO BEAR.
TO TAKE US OUT OF ORBIT.
